name: Wings of the Dragon
summary: You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed.
description:
You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed. You gain the dragon wings sorcerer bloodline spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. If you already have a focus pool, increase your number of Focus Points by 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
